name: You Got The Gist of It, Right?
name_original: You Got The Gist of It, Right?
description:
words are so sluggish compared to thoughts, but ... they got the gist of it, right?

first creation for my Game A Fortnight course, made in a strict 2 week period in response to the theme "10 seconds or less". 

this is not a puzzle game :)

NOTE: the in-browser version distorted the graphic showing your result at the end of each round! Windows users can download the game build below to play the 'proper' version.
